support_tickets.subject: Problema com maquininha
support_tickets.description: Minha maquininha não está conectando ao Wi-Fi

support_tickets.subject: Dúvida sobre taxas
support_tickets.description: Gostaria de saber mais sobre as taxas de pagamento com cartão

support_tickets.subject: Help
support_tickets.description: Help. Create support ticket. Subject: Card machine error E101. Description: It fails every day during payments.

support_tickets.subject: Card reader shows E101 error and restarts daily
support_tickets.description: Card reader displays error E101 during payment attempts; screen freezes and the device restarts, interrupting transactions. Issue occurs every day. USER_ID: user123. User requested high priority.

support_tickets.subject: Printer error E103, stops every hour
support_tickets.description: POS printer fails intermittently and stops approximately every hour. System logs record error code E103. Issue is observed daily and impacts transaction processing.

support_tickets.subject: Payment terminal crashes and E101 error
support_tickets.description: The payment card machine repeatedly crashes during transactions and intermittently displays error code E101 when processing payments, preventing successful transactions.

support_tickets.subject: Card reader freezing and E101 error during checkout
support_tickets.description: Card reader keeps freezing during checkout and intermittently displays error code E101. User reports issue while processing payments; no additional details provided.

support_tickets.subject: E101 crashes
support_tickets.description: User reports crashes with error code E101; no further details provided.
